h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide
content: When her health bar is also knocked down slightly, they will start to swap in and out. It can start to get a bit hectic, so use Cloudstep to throw them off, heavy attacks to stagger and knock down their shields, and Immobilize to keep them from zipping about.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When her health bar is also knocked down slightly, they will start to swap in and out. It can start to get a bit hectic, so use Cloudstep to throw them off, heavy attacks to stagger and knock down their shields, and Immobilize to keep them from zipping about.
